Generates light by causing a chemical reaction. Chemical light sources are widely used by stalkers as autonomous light sources in various emergency situations and other cases when there is no access to other lighting sources. Being completely self-sufficient, durable, fireproof, waterproof and suitable for long-term storage, their range of application is extremely wide. 
This variant emits a Green Light, it has a balanced range and illumination, good for almost everything.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 40 real-life minutes work time 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Range: 12 metres

Chemical light sources are widely used by stalkers as autonomous light sources in various emergency situations and other cases when there is no access to other lighting sources. The gold coins of Nicholas II are the banknotes minted during the reign of the emperor, i.e. from 1894 to 1917. Of course, all the coins of this period are quite rare and valuable, but the individual copies are particularly expensive. They include coins face value of 5 and 10 rubles in 1906, as well as gift items. The price can reach several thousand dollars, depending on the face value, appearance, the presence of mechanical damage. People who found such a thing in the zone can be counted on the fingers.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] an incredibly rare thing.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] antiques
%c[255,238,153,26]

Diazepam, first introduced to the market as Valium, is a medicine of the benzodiazepines family, which usually have a calming effect. It is widely used to treat a range of symptoms, including anxiety, muscle spasms, seizures, sleep problems and restless leg syndrome. Common side effects include drowsiness and coordination problems.

Combat bayonet-knife 6x4 with a serrated blade. Good for silently eliminating enemies.

Improved model of the "Response" abnormal activity detector. Records the presence of artifacts and measures the distance to the nearest artifact. The distance to the artifact is determined by the frequency of the beep. The artifact search mode is activated by raising the antenna cover on the front panel of the device. Due to the accumulated data from the field testing of the first model, the design has been redesigned and added an additional signal receiver, due to which it is able to find more common artifacts.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological device
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Power: 9V batteries (CR-9V)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] low power consumption

An outdated model of the "Response" anomalous activity detector. Records the presence of artifacts and measures the distance to the nearest one. The distance to the artifact is determined by the frequency of the sound signal. Artifact search mode is activated by raising the antenna cover on the front panel of the device. Because it was the first serial sample, it can only find the simplest artifacts. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:

Detector of abnormal activity of the past generation. It is equipped with a locator of abnormal formations and an LED display for displaying directions to the artifact, and is capable of not only detecting artifacts, but also determining distances to them. The artifact search mode is activated by lifting the antenna cover on the front of the device. Unfortunately, a somewhat outdated list of detected artifacts is sewn into the device tightly - at the hardware level.

A new generation detector scanner used by scientists. Thanks to three advanced registration cameras, the location of the artifact relative to the detector is displayed on a special screen. Able to record radiation and the presence of anomalies. The artifact search mode is activated by raising the indicator panel on the front of the device; in this mode, it is capable of detecting all artifacts known to science.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:

A prototype of the scanner of anomalous zones of extended functionality. Added a program to recognize static zones of abnormal activity that are available in the database; this preserves the ability to detect artifacts. The location of anomalous zones and artifacts relative to the detector is displayed on a special screen. The artifact search program, included when the scoreboard is raised on the front of the device, has been improved; theoretically, this allows to detect anomalous formations not yet known to science..

Normal rusty bolt. Such bolts are usually used by both experienced and newcomers to lay a safe path among the anomalies.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,140,140,140] • %c[0,140,140,140] common object

This machine gun combat system is a portable device with a complex system of two-stage ammunition directly from the backpack directly to the weapon through a flexible sleeve. Despite its weight and low accuracy, this weapon found its admirers in the zone. It is used mainly to fight the superior forces of the enemy and clean up the dens of mutants.

Russian binocular BPOs 10x42 (the letter "c" in the name indicates the presence of a long-range grid) is suitable for observations in nature during hunting, in a campaign. The binocular produced by the COMS 10x42 plant based on the standard Porro prism system provide good resolution throughout the field of vision. The image is bright and clean without distortion and with the preservation of natural colors. 
 
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Zoom: %c[0,170,170,170]8x
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] The condition of the glass: %c[0,170,170,170]very good

It has a relatively small weight and quite strong optics with adjustable multiplicity. Allows you to look at the terrain and buildings from a long distance. The image is bright and clean without distortion and with the preservation of natural colors.
 
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Zoom: %c[0,170,170,170]12x
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] The condition of the glass: %c[0,170,170,170]very good

Allows you to look at objects that are at a great distance in detail. The built-in thermal imaging allows to identify and localize heat sources, similar to the human body. The image is bright and clean without distortion and with the preservation of natural colors.
 
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Zoom: %c[0,170,170,170]16x
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] The condition of the glass: %c[0,170,170,170]very good

A simple sheet of fabric, widely used for spriniting clothes, and for cleaning the mechanisms of firearms from surplus oil with a solvent. You can use any needles and glue.

A sheet of military-grade textiles that can be used in the field to repair clothing and repair armor. Valued for its relatively low cost and greater versatility. This material is widely used by stalkers. A versatile sewing kit and advanced glue are required. It can also be used to remove moisture when servicing weapons.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military product
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used:%c[0,170,170,170] Repairing equipment, servicing weapons (+4%)

A thick, dense sheet of textile fabric reinforced with Kevlar. It can be used to repair medium- and high-end armor. A large enough sheet, you can patch a few damaged areas. An advanced high-end sewing kit and glue are required for use. It can also be used in cleaning and lubricating weapons - due to excessive density, it can penetrate even in hard-to-reach areas in firearms.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:

A piece of dense leather 15x15cm, which can be used in the field to repair clothes and repair armor. It can be used for small leather works. This material is widely used by stalkers. A versatile sewing kit or advanced glue is required. It can also be used to remove moisture when servicing weapons.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military product

Steel yarn, also known as wire yarn or metal sponge, is a bundle of thin soft steel threads. It is used as an abrasive in finishing repairs for grinding wooden or metal objects, cleaning household utensils and giving texture to canvas when drawing. Steel yarn bundles can be used to fine-clean equipment and distribute lubricant and cleaning solvents in more detail.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological device
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used:%c[0,170,170,170] weapons maintenance (+6%)

A semi-solid lubricant consisting mainly of soap emulsified with mineral or vegetable oil. It is used to grease sedentary mechanisms. It can also act as a sealant to prevent water from entering. This type of lubricant has high frictional characteristics due to their increased viscosity.

%c[0,170,170,170]The spray contains oils designed to lubricate and protect firearms. Spraying in large quantities on weapons will not prolong its life, but only eat up the mechanisms, especially when used frequently in combat. Before spraying, it is advisable to thoroughly clean the weapon from all foreign substances and dirt. You can also use specials. tools to remove hard-to-reach parts and more detailed lubricant. Special components improve the glide of all moving mechanisms inside the weapon. The working temperature is up to -55 degrees Celsius and no higher than 78 degrees Celsius.

%c[0,170,170,170]The Red Army's armory oil, which has been in use for more than 70 years. The metal oil is divided into two parts: in one oil, in another cleaning solvent. It was widely used during the Second World War, attached from the factory to the rifle Mosin. Since then, the composition of liquids has been improved several times, but the design of the oil has remained unchanged. The Deuce is very popular in the zone due to its versatility. It is worth considering that a good lubricant will require special tools that will help cleaning and lubricating components to get into hard-to-reach places. It should be seen as a supplement, not as an independent means of cleaning and lubrication.

%c[0,170,170,170]Plastic budget bottle with Russian weapons mineral oil. Despite the low cost, it is very useful in use to keep firearms in good condition with long and frequent use. For greater effect, it is recommended to use in conjunction with cleaning brushes. According to the manufacturer, «Rusaê» is particularly effective for automatic weapons because of its low friction factor. It also contains various anti-corrosion additives that keep the metal in proper condition.

%c[0,170,170,170]A high quality cleaning solvent for firearms is manufactured in the west and specially adapted for harsh environmental conditions. Like all solvents, it is designed to prevent rust and remove dirt, lead, metal particles. A special property that makes it very popular in the zone - it removes heavy radioactive particles from metal, acts quickly, efficiently and safely in use. It is also recommended to use in conjunction with tools or laundry material. Due to the high quality and relative rarity, the price is quite high.

%c[0,170,170,170]A set of special brushes to clean the barrel and other parts of the firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, residues of lubricant and other foreign materials that accumulate during use. It is used everywhere in the zone to maintain weapons in good condition, which is associated not only with the danger of each attack, but also with extreme environmental conditions of the zone. You can use in conjunction with general purpose tools for more detailed cleaning or with cleaning solvents to more effectively remove lubricant residues. It can also be used to apply weapons lubricant, but to save many stalkers apply animal fats instead of expensive specialized lubricant. This set is suitable for pistols of all major calibers.

%c[0,170,170,170]This kit contains oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and special tools used to disassemble weapons and its various mechanisms. Also comes with a set of basic spare parts for firearms. In short - there is everything you need to repair a weapon, if you have any idea how and what is arranged in it. Heavy enough, but irreplaceable in long forays deep into the zone, as it will help save your life with the unexpected failure of weapons. Because of the spare parts supplied, this kit can only be used to disassemble and repair small pistol calibers. You can also combine with additional materials or kits.

%c[0,170,170,170]A simple sewing kit consisting of a coil of threads, several steel needles and one simple scissors. They can sew holes from bullets or simple torn areas on equipment. Its use is limited due to the small number of threads included in the set, as well as because of the fragile needles, so that one such kit with a strong deterioration of equipment will not be enough. For the same reason, sharing is possible with only a few materials. However, it is highly recommended that you use everything on hand to unlock the full potential of the kit.

%c[0,170,170,170]The military-grade heavy advanced sewing kit is designed to work with cracks in the protective plates of modern body armor. It contains a large number of metal threads, allowing you to sew together literally torn into pieces clothes. It is also able to sew heavy and especially rough skins of mutants. Also included are basic mechanical tools that can be used to disassemble a piece of clothing or helmet in order to save repair materials. This is the best and highest quality sewing kit available within the Exclusion Area.

%c[0,170,170,170]The cheapest of the synthetic adhesives available in the zone. The main element is an epoxy resin solution, which can glue two scraps of tissue or patch a small hole on the helmet. But it will be useless for significant damage to equipment. On the other hand, "Star" is popular among stalkers for its price, and if you follow and glue your equipment from time to time, can be very useful and extend the life of your goodness. It's a good idea to share with the materials available at hand. However, glue will not help you fasten the skins of mutants. It can be used to facilitate and speed up the sewing process.

%c[0,170,170,170]Advanced glue produced by the Ukrainian chemical industry. The basic difference of glue "Tur" from analogues - the basis from epoxy resin is capable to glue the hardest materials. Stalkers choose glue "Tur" for simplicity of use and universality, especially when there are no additional spare materials at hand. The glue easily binds lightweight fabrics and protective materials, such as Kevlar, but is useless when bonding metal.

%c[0,170,170,170]«Ì17» is the result of the creation of a Soviet military-industrial research project to develop an extremely powerful single-ingredient glue that could be used in absolutely any situation, regardless of the objectives pursued and the presence of handy materials. It was decided to use a strong metacrylate, which is used to clutch plastic or metal. In the case of M17, this aspect has been bypassed and improved, so this glue is effective with absolutely any materials. This glue is also easily diluted with water to the desired consistency depending on the desired end result. There are almost no damages that this product could not cope with. It is used with any materials available in the Exclusion Area.

%c[0,170,170,170]The repair kit will allow urgent repair of equipment in the field. Includes duct tape and ready-to-use sheets of fabric and tarpaulin of different shapes and sizes, which allow you to quickly patch damaged areas of any armor. Its use is especially useful to prevent further destruction of the suit. Due to the relatively low strength of the components and materials supplied, the kit can only be used for minor repairs and is not effective in cases of heavy armor (Kevlar or metal). For the same reason, the kit has very limited use in repair and maintenance of helmets.

%c[0,170,170,170]Field version of the universal kit for repairing equipment, a kind of "golden mean" between mobility (weight) and versatility of application. It consists of military-grade tools and materials sufficient to carry out maintenance of most types of modern suits and helmets. Strong tools allow you to work with Kevlar and metal. Additional tools and materials (including mutant skins) can improve the repair efficiency of equipment. It can also be used to disassemble equipment or helmets to get spare parts.

%c[0,170,170,170]This kit contains everything you need to effectively repair modern combat helmets and built-in systems. It includes advanced tools to work with materials such as Kevlar, steel, titanium, and strong and fast-acting polymers based on modern adhesives. There are no sewing accessories in the set, so it is ineffective for repairing flexible and soft materials, which are also found in the inner lining of helmets. Therefore, it is recommended to use additional sewing kits to disassemble and repair ear protection mechanisms in order to improve the overall efficiency of repair.

Researchers of the nature of the zone and its creations. With good attitude on their part, a successful stalker can sell well found in the swag zone by scientists without a merchant-broker. Scientists themselves belong to the Mobile Laboratory - it looks like a small metal bunker with small tinted windows. It is able to withstand almost all known injuries of any nature. It can be put offline for several months, for which it is equipped with reliable life support systems. It is delivered by cargo helicopter to the zone. The staff of the laboratory (Ecologists) never let outsiders further the external airlock chamber, so none of the stalkers entered the laboratory.

A clearly paramilitary group with strict discipline: its members live in fact by the statute. Only representatives of "Duty" do not trade unique creatures of the zone with the outside world: according to rumors, all the artifacts found by these people are surrendered by scientists. Each "debt" considers its main goal to protect the world from the influence of the zone. Most of the group's operations are associated with the extermination of monsters, so the raids "Duty" often save ordinary stalkers from many pressing problems. He has long been a fiercely feuding with the Freedom Group. The factions should be kept secret from their fighters, as this can lead to serious conflicts. A group that resembles a religious sect. Its members believe that in the center of the zone rests an evolutionary crystal of unearthly origin - Monolith. Most stalkers despise monolith adherents, considering them bonkers. Since its inception, the group has prevented the promotion of stalkers to the center of the zone, citing the unkind intentions of the latter in relation to Monolith. According to rumors, the monoliths have a large base somewhere closer to the center of the zone, but no one knows its exact location, except the members of the group. The factions should be kept secret from their fighters, as this can lead to serious conflicts. However, when selling to the relevant merchants, you can get good money.

Military flasks are designed to drink water in small sips. Produced and cleaned by doctors and scientists. First, water in combination with a special type of alcohol is boiled at a very high temperature for cleaning and disinfection. Secondly, the water is cooled in refrigerators. In the end, we get completely purified water from radiation contamination. If you still doubt its purity - you can add a couple of tablets "Aquatabs." Due to the complex process of production and cleaning, military flasks with water appear in limited quantities and are sold to stalkers at a reasonable price. Medics also have them available, but they are a little more expensive, as there is a mark-up for the cost of deliveries.

Potassium manganese acid, potassium salt of manganese acid. It is a dark purple, almost black crystals, when dissolved in water forming a brightly colored fuchsia color solution. The use of this salt is most often based on the high oxidizing power of permanganate ion, which provides antiseptic action. It is also used to remove radioactive compounds that have a chemical bond with the surface material.

This journal describes in detail the various trade manipulations with drugs. Specific faces with nicknames, places and times of meetings. Some transactions are carried out through electronic payments, while others with large amounts of cash payments. As you look through the pages, it's clear that Liberty is a major distributor of organic drugs, such as marijuana. Bandits supply the strongest and most dangerous synthetic drugs, such as salicylic acid and cocaine. It appears that each group in the zone has some place in such transactions. Monolith, apparently, buys drugs in large quantities in exchange for more expensive types of ammunition and a technological object.

Epinephrine (also known as adrenaline) is a hormone in conjunction with a neurotransmitter. Epinephrine performs many functions in the body: instantly regulates the heart rate, dilates blood vessels to facilitate the passage of air through them, and causes metabolic shifts. Adrenaline is released when fighting or escaping from the sympathetic nervous system. The effects lead to an increase in blood glucose and fatty acids, thus providing the body with instant substrates to produce energy inside cells throughout the body.

A small portable power unit, the size of a radio, during the Cold War. Almost any type of batteries and batteries are suitable. Uses energy from the batteries to the last drop and transmits it to electronic devices through the incoming small thin wires. You can connect almost any equipment, regardless of the complexity and years of production. It is these devices that help stalkers maintain the working state of their electronic devices.

PFM-1 (short for the Anti-Personnel Fugas Mine, NATOV's name "Green Parrot") is a standard service anti-personnel mine of the Red Army, used mainly during the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan. Its use during the conflict has resulted in numerous civilian casualties, especially among children, as accidentally scattered mines are often perceived by children as toys because of its funny shapes and colours. For this reason, PFM-1 was nicknamed "Child Killer". Since then, the hull of the mine has been significantly altered. However, like most of the other decommissioned weapons, these mines have migrated from the Great Earth to the zone. It is mainly valued for its functionality, convenience, compact size and light weight. The disadvantage is a small amount of explosives, its power is not enough to kill a heavily armed stalker by an explosion alone. For this reason, mines should be used in combination with other explosive materials and the mine should be used as a fuze.

An improvised explosive device based on a warhead from an RPG-7 projectile and a battery-powered fuze. Looks like it's already pretty shabby, so it could break any second. Fortunately, the lack of trigger gives you some hope that it will not detonate right in your hands, unless of course some moron will not shoot at you and get into the warhead. In the zone, improvised explosive devices are very popular and are used by stalkers for a variety of purposes, such as to get into an inaccessible place, or to organize an ambush. They are also often placed next to mines to increase the power of the explosion. The shell is very easy to hide, so you can organize a very inconspicuous trap.

%c[0,170,170,170]Large (capacity about 20l), half-empty metal canister with 95m gasoline. Canisters were delivered to the zone in large quantities following Ukrainian military equipment. Initially, they served their purpose, but after the second Chernobyl disaster all vehicles in the exclusion zone for an unknown reason broke down. Some stalkers are still trying to resurrect the deceased technique, while others have found fuel more rational use - as an explosive. After a direct hit, the canister lights up and explodes with a slight delay. Although the canister is very inconvenient and bulky, but after its detonation will lay down any target, even if it will be a heavy protective suit. On the other hand, it explodes so powerfully that an explosion can catch the fuze itself. Therefore, it should be used with caution. Rumor has it that one stalker nicknamed Yuya once failed a pseudo-giant, luring him into a trap with such canisters. He released in the canister all the stock from Makarov, which blazed and rushed under the feet of the mutant. They say a rumble was heard all over Jupiter..

The empty metal gas cylinder, soaked from the inside with special polymers to store gas inside CO2/O2, and on the outside is covered with a giant to protect against weather conditions and ultraviolet light. This gas cylinder is suitable for storing inside any industrial gas under pressure. In the zone, most often in such cylinders transport methane, propane, ethane and butane - all these gases can be used for cooking or heating rooms, as well as for combat purposes. Now the empty cylinder is not of much value, but its metal can be used for overhaul of armor.

A compact folding oven that uses dry wood as fuel to keep burning and is designed for cooking. However, since a good tree, not affected by radiation, in the harsh conditions of the Exclusion Zone is not easy to find, stalkers as an alternative use imported coal - as the most affordable alternative to wood-burning fuel. The oven is picking up a temperature sufficient to grill the meat of local mutants, but more modern equipment will be needed to process the most contaminated meat. The basic fire safety rules must be followed during use. Made of stainless steel and ultralight titanium.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]Note:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Remember, although coal and you can get in the zone at relatively small prices - for cooking it will require a large amount. That's why you can go bankrupt on coal. On the other hand, coal does not have significant weight, so it is convenient to take it on long forays into the zone.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Mutant meat, which does not require significant thermal treatment is called "low origin", and meat that requires high temperatures for roasting is called meat of "high origin".

The furnace has undergone rigorous testing in the field and has been used in countless expeditions over the years. It is incredibly strong, reliable and powerful. Works in the most difficult and harsh conditions: both at huge heights, there and at extreme temperatures. It warms up very well and can be used with any kind of fuel, including butane, gasoline, diesel, kerosene, paraffin and even aviation fuel. It has a convenient temperature control, so you can adjust the heat to any need, even wearing gloves.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]Note:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Since the fuels used by the multifuel furnace are very efficient energy sources, unlike wood and coal, such an oven has a greater perspective and efficiency than traditional wood or coal-fired furnaces. On the other hand, such energy-efficient fuel is most often transported in heavy metal containers, so its use is more justified in bases and parking lots than in the field.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Mutant meat, which does not require significant thermal treatment is called "low origin", and meat that requires high temperatures for roasting is called meat of "high origin".

Indispensable for a fire in difficult weather conditions. Soaked with an anti-smouldering solution that eliminates the occurrence of fire. A simple set of sticks made of pine wood, soaked in resin. Anyone who has ever tried to start an open-air fire has come across the fact that random gusts of wind can extinguish the flames in the bud. The temperature of the flame corresponds to the temperature of the fire of the tree, and the burning temperature of the tree is approximately 800-1000 degrees Celsius. The head of the match is heated to 1500 degrees Celsius, and can catch fire even under water.\n%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] Used to light a campfire\n%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] waterproof

The lead metal container for artifacts, (SMC) is an improved metal container for 2 compartments, with thick walls lined with foam, as well as a heavy lid with sealing rubber bands. Specially designed to transport radioactive materials. In the SMC zone, it is most commonly used to store and carry artifacts. It blocks all negative radiation emanating from artifacts, thereby ensuring the user's safety. One and size, it can not be attached to the belt - this means that it blocks both the positive properties of artifacts and negative. It is advisable to work with the contents of the container with special tongs to work with artifacts.

An old, faded notebook wrapped in some case so that the pages don't get soured. Nevertheless, the diary is already so spoiled by time that only a part of the text manages to disassemble:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"I have to start writing somewhere, I need to pour out my soul on paper and throw my burden off my shoulders. I hope to leave something after my death to those who read this diary. At least he won't repeat my mistakes. I have almost no friends, and there are no friends in the zone. All these traders look at me like I'm an outright. This bearded guy on "The Back" smiles with a sarcastic smile every time he sees me, and the Hawaiian merchant constantly mocks me with an unflappable look. I just need some ammunition, food and water from them from time to time.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]I decided to record everything that happened that night so that someone could know what I was going through, so that someone could understand why I preferred to be alone. I came here on my own, but soon met the same newcomer. It turned out that he was very fond of local mineral rocks. He has a hobby from the Big Earth - to collect stones, and even more so he was attracted to local artifacts - strange stones that flooded the zone. Of course, he later collected a lot of artifacts, but at the cost of everything was formed in his stomach a huge tumor. Frequent vomiting, diarrhea, constant stress... He looked like a pregnant woman, but instead of a child in his stomach developed a huge malignant tumor. He even named it after his first pet. I certainly didn't mind. I liked him, we formed a good company. We have never contacted bandits, did not attack mutants for nothing, we just wandered around anomalies, choosing the most interesting stone formations, and sometimes when especially lucky - came across and artifacts."
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] personal thing
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used:%c[0,170,170,170] cleaning weapons (+2%)

An old, faded notebook wrapped in some case so that the pages don't get soured. However, the diary is already so spoiled by time that only part of the text manages to disassemble:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"Once the conversation came about one anomaly, as it turned out, located in the depths of a cave or cracks in the ground, I do not know what to name. There must have been a huge number of artifacts, but no one wanted to go there with us for some reason. "Cowards and fools" we thought then. Why didn't anyone want to get rich and live an easy life? Then a sudden rush of courage came upon us, we immediately gathered and went straight to the cave. We didn't even have time to look into the cave, as some dark shadow flew over us. I tripped, hit my head and passed out. After a while I came to my senses and heard someone moaning. "Animals," as I initially thought, but then suddenly realized that my friend was lying and moaning in front of me. His skin was torn all over his body, his bleeding wounds could see all the muscles. He crawled from the cave himself, conscious, dragging his guts behind him... It was a miracle he didn't die on the spot. I didn't understand anything, I pulled out my gun and started shooting towards that cave. I had 20 rounds of ammunition for the gun when I had seven rounds left - something grabbed my arm. I kept shooting, pulling the trigger convulsively. After a moment my grip loosened, but I kept pulling the trigger even when I ran out of ammo. At the time, I didn't even realize what I had just done to my friend. I didn't even have the guts to pick up his stuff, I just ran. How after this I could talk to someone or make new acquaintances, when the zone at any moment can repeat his evil joke. It's better to be alone. Friendship has its price and risk. It is not necessary to start especially warm friendships, because all this can be lost in a moment. Yes, I realized it from my own experience, stuffed a lump on my head, which will not let me forget it".
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] personal thing
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used:%c[0,170,170,170] weapons maintenance (+2%)

Educational leaflets with a large "Freedom" emblem in the upper right corner and a small picture of a gun and a man on his knees. It is called Interrogation Methods: Basics and is written in the group's unforced slang.:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"I shouldn't even mention it, because it's all obvious and so. But I'm really going to share it with you, just don't go right and left, or you won't get it. Throw that leaflet away, burn it or give it to someone you trust. You don't want everyone to know, do you? You could be in the place of the interrogator one day, right? Do you have a chastous? So keep those sheets to yourself and don't tell me you weren't warned.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Everyone has their own stash. Even the poorest, hapless bandit living in the zone has a stash of dry-pikes and a few rounds. It's all working under these laws. You collect some money, you sell a few artifacts, mutant parts, you rob the dead, but usually you have warm bodies, you buy food and weapons. Even when shit flies right in the wind in your face, you're left with a smirk on your face because you have a trump card up your sleeve that can save your skin. These are the harsh laws of the zone, no one will help you here.".

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] personal thing

Educational leaflets with a large "Freedom" emblem in the upper right corner and a small picture of a gun and a man on his knees. It is called Interrogation Methods: Basics and is written in the group's unforced slang.:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"But I think now we will not talk about help from the outside and about the relations of stalkers. If you want to get important information about the whereabouts of someone's hiding place - start with the choice of the victim. When you think about it, you'll choose a quiet place where there's no one - shoot at once in the hands and feet, get as much pain as possible until they realize that you're their closest friend at the moment. And then they'll drop their guns and kneel before you. Talk to them hard and convincingly, but don't kill them, after all there are so many mutants in the area - they'll do the job for you. Let's not make the zone worse. Tell them you'll go away, scare them as hard as you can, make them realize that the end is near. They usually understand it and give up.".

A couple of pages ripped from someone's memoir. The manuscript is in blue ink that is almost washed away from the influence of the environment, which makes the text almost indecipherable. The author is unknown.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"I still feel the warmth of that anomaly on my back. It burns even when I'm just sitting on Skadovsk, in a safe place, away from dangers and from all the heating devices. You have no idea what I go through every time I get close to these anomalies. Hell, my back burns even more, now it's my anomaly detector. After getting into a burning or acid anomaly - simple burns you will not get away with. It's like you've taken part of the zone forever inside yourself. "Under the sign of the zone," as I call it. Horror, there is no physical law in the zone. I just don't know what to expect from the anomalies here. I will more than overcome a dozen bloodsuckers on a dark night, but each time I just get lost at the sight of an anomaly... Is that how that's possible? It can't be a reality at all! I can't stop thinking that this whole zone is a single nightmare that repeats itself over and over again.".

A couple of pages ripped from someone's memoir. The manuscript is in blue ink that is almost washed away from the influence of the environment, which makes the text almost indecipherable. The author is unknown.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"Every time I think about it, my back trembles in pain and turns into a single red lump. I've been out of the blue for the last four months, and I've been working on killing mutants. But you won't last long, and your back still reacts as if it have its own mind. Sometimes I feel sorry I didn't leave that burning stove. Maybe I'd be more useful if I became food for those boars. Although, no... Boars, they're stupid creatures. But if they attack the same "Skadovsk" - it will fall in a few days. They won't be stopped by bullets. Boars are generally useless creatures, their meat is terrible, even an experienced cook can not make it edible. Sometimes I go to wander around the shadle, my back barely tolerates a backpack. I go there because I always feel like I left something there that calls me from time to time. Because of these terrible back pains, I have to sleep on my stomach or on my side. I don't like sleeping on my side, I don't sleep well. The zone changes us without asking permission."

Report on the walking dead, report 39 V modification 2 (part 1 of 3)

Text typed on a typewriter with reference to membership of the Environmental Research Group, judging by the stamps and emblems. Classified as strictly confidential and signed:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Arkady Tsvetkovsky
%c[0,170,170,170]Junior Researcher in Laboratory and Research Hopper RX12
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Extracted information about the walking dead, report 39 V is out of the question.2 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Date: 19.03.2014
%c[0,170,170,170]Folder: 34
%c[0,170,170,170]Page: 1 in 3
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"zombified" is the term used by the local population when it comes to samples of semi-living creatures, which are difficult to call intelligent. Scientific data have shown that their brain does not conduct any thought processes and the neurological activity of the brain structure is virtually non-existent, which confirms the fact of the death of brain cells to a critical level. However, field tests have proved that for reasons unknown to science, their dead brain is able to give pulses for simple mechanical reactions (something resembling instincts, but with significant differences in logic of behavior). According to one version, this is due to the result of endless neurochemical reactions in the body, which cause the body to move in a certain way in response to certain specific stimuli. When they are threatened by something, they demonstrate extremely aggressive behavior, so it is better to approach them with great care. Tests have shown that their physiology is so altered that tissues are able to independently maintain neural communication, i.e. even the parts separated from the body can function independently without receiving any nutrients to generate energy. One of the most successful such experiments is maintaining the capacity of the liver and heart for 3 months without binding and connections with other organs and circulation. Further analyses will be able to suggest molecular and subatomic features.

The text typed on the typewriter with reference to belonging to the Ecological Research Group, judging by the stamps and emblems. Classified as strictly confidential and signed:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Arkady Tsvetkovsky
%c[0,170,170,170]Associate Researcher at rx12 Laboratory and Research Bunker
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Extracted information about the walking dead, report 39V changed 2
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Date: 19.03.2014
%c[0,170,170,170]Folder: 34
%c[0,170,170,170]Page: 2 in 3
 
%c[0,170,170,170]The results we have obtained will help explain the mystery that being repeatedly wounded in the limbs, pelvic area, peripheral organs and other areas, they are able to function indefinitely without enduring particular difficulties. Moving them is usually difficult, the performance of any actions is out of the question, but the reflexes of handling weapons and pulling the trigger remained unchanged. It is quite possible to use other simple tools and technological devices.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]The terms "kill" and "destroy" in contact with deactivated samples should not be used. This is largely due to the psychological point of view, because the term "decontamination" is more neutral than "destruction", thus avoiding the burden on the psyche and suppressing the feeling of remorse. Deactivation of the sample requires interruption of connections of the brain with the musculoskeletal apparatus, which is preferable to do a ballistic injury in the area of the brain or spinal cord. Each member of the scientific team should keep in mind that they of course remain functional even after the sample is deactivated, so additional security measures should be taken. More effective is the removal of the vertebrae or brain stem with surgery.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:

Extracted information about the walking dead, report 39V changed 2 (part 3 of 3)

Extracted information about the walking dead, report 39V changed 2 (part 3 of 3)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Arkady Tsvetkovsky
%c[0,170,170,170]Junior Researcher in Laboratory and Research Hopper RX12
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Extracted information about the walking dead, report 39V changed 2
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Date: 19.03.2014
%c[0,170,170,170]Folder: 34
%c[0,170,170,170]Page: 3 of 3
 
%c[0,170,170,170]In exceptionally rare cases, the behavior of some "zombified" individuals resembles the behavior of more intelligent animals: they drop weapons or refuse to show aggression in general. These samples are of the greatest importance for research, so decontamination is not recommended. Capture of individuals and further analysis in laboratories is of paramount importance. The most interested side in this kind of research - neuropsychologists in connection with the potential of brain stem research, with its transplantation. In theory, this could help patients in the late stages of Alzheimer's disease and other complex diseases.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]If possible, avoid damage to the kidneys and heart during decontamination. These organs have great potential for research into transplantation to other viable organisms. Collecting organs from killed "zombies" is also possible, but it is worth being careful, as local stalkers may have emotional connections with some instances. If a meeting with stalkers is inevitable, two options can be taken to avoid a combat clash. First, when working in a group with a novice stalker should not cut the eyes of the sample - it is simply inhumane. Secondly, when working in a group with a stalker-veteran it is better to motivate him with something, as they suppress emotions more restrainedly. Moreover, when working with the local human population, it is also possible to draw some conclusions on psychological examinations.

A handwritten piece of paper. At the beginning of the text, the writing style is extremely chaotic and untidy, as if the person writing it was suffering from a severe mental disorder. The most interesting thing is that the subsequent text becomes more clear, the narrative is more vivid, and by the end of the diary the text is almost perfect. The note says:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"As far as I remember now, there was darkness around me, I could not see anything. No problem... Even time. But suddenly there was a light in front of me! The light is so bright, so cozy... I wanted to touch him, I wanted to feel it. I realized, I knew he was trying to help me, trying to save me. I knew...
 
%c[0,170,170,170]And after I touched the light, I forgot about everything. There was no past life - behind me was a total darkness. The only light source was in front of me. His name was Monolith. He saved me, and I am eternally grateful to him for that. Sometimes faces pop up in front of me, faces from the past... A woman and a child... My family? I'm wearing a white jumpsuit... Maybe I was a scientist... What a strange word it is... Radar... No! Is there darkness?! She wants me dead! I DON'T DO ME! No, there's no turning back! Just go, just to the light! To the light! To Monolith!"

%c[0,170,170,170]How are you doing? How are the kids? Tell Sashka that if he doesn't listen, I'll beat him up when I get home. What about me? Well, I don't think you're going to understand me. But listen: The zone... This place... Unique. Only here can I feel connected to other people. only here I see people as they really are. There are no masks, only the harsh truth. I'll tell you more colorfully later, when I meet you. I made good money here! We can finally buy you the necklace you've been wanting for so long. Yes, and thank you for writing to me, don't forget me. They really help me and cheer me up even in the harshest of times. When I think of you, the world becomes a lot easier. See you soon. Say hello to the kids from me!

A note written by one of the mercenaries. Looks like he's decided to write down some thoughts about his activities in the zone. His intentions are incomprehensible.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]"Well, in general, what I see here is nothing special. We're all mercenaries, we're still good luck soldiers. However, we can choose spontaneously what we do and what we shouldn't do. Sometimes we don't even accept job applications because it's too dirty even for us. If the client wants to kill a few good people, honestly earning a living spilling sweat and blood - forget about this bastard, in the zone such problems can be solved without us, the same marauders and bandits, enough bastards! But when you need to protect someone - it's another matter! So if you need to kill someone , turn to the snouts. They're not that picky about murders. We're different. Keep that in mind the next time you poke your money in our face.".
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] personal thing
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used:%c[0,170,170,170] weapons maintenance (+1%)

The printed part of the transmission of radio signals between military units located in the zone. The fact that this document was discovered among the scat crew members indicates that he must have been involved in clandestine fraudin order to obtain surveillance data. It states:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]«- HQ, this is MSSRC 1-03. We got photos from the research institute, as well as 240 photos of the anomaly swamp, about 1400 photos of the central base. When do we get back?
%c[0,170,170,170]- MSRC 1-03, this is HQ. There's no return at the moment. There are some problems in the military warehouses. MSRC 4-07 requesting assistance. Once again, however, their SOS signal at this time is very strong, we hope they are still alive.
%c[0,170,170,170]- Roger, this is HQ. Send in a helicopter.
%c[0,170,170,170]- No, it's not. There is too much abnormal activity at "Agroprom" research institute now, too dangerous. Move to Amber, our MI-24 will take you from there.
%c[0,170,170,170]- Roger. Is there any information on the next release?
%c[0,170,170,170]- That's right. Sahrov says there's still two whole days until the next activity. But still, hurry up, you shouldn't rely on their information, unreliable.
%c[0,170,170,170]- Roger that. We're moving out, tell Bird to be on Amber at 7:00. MSRC 1-03, out.
%c[0,170,170,170]- Wait, 1-03. What about tunnel N-2? Did you find anything there?
%c[0,170,170,170]- That's right. We found a new anomaly in it. It looks like some kind of teleport. Should be of interest to those eggheads on Amber, our electronics died when we approached it for measurements of the psi fields. I can't understand where such strong electronic waves came from.
%c[0,170,170,170]- Roger understood you, MSRC 1-03. Good luck on the way to Amber. The helicopter will be by 7 o'clock. H..
 
%c[0,140,140,140]CHARACTERISTICS:

%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used:%c[0,170,170,170] weapons maintenance (+1%)

A handwritten letter addressed to Nicholas. Most likely part of the correspondence between the two stalkers. Although correspondence in the zone is conducted mainly with the help of the PDA, many stalkers prefer traditional letters, especially on personal issues. These letters are then sent to the couriers who deliver them to the zone. Most often, the letter reaches the recipient in a few days - the probability of intercepting such a message is much lower than through the PDA. The profession of courier is widely appreciated among stalkers. The letter reads:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]«Nikolay,
 
%c[0,170,170,170]I just got back from walking to the center of the Zone. Oh, it was hell! Monolitans and warriors are trying to wipe each other off the face of the earth. There are moments of quiet when it seems like they've reached a cease-fire agreement, but there's really no agreement. Constant chaos and destruction, I had no choice but to get out of there. I almost got killed by fucking fanatics, but it's all my fault, I just lost my vigilance. Anyway, I got to Pripyat, I plan to stay here for a while. So the mission we discussed earlier will have to be postponed until it's safer here. I don't sleep much since I got here, but I feel pretty good. We'll stay in touch.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Take care of yourself, Ryuk».

The drug from the set of an individual first-aid kit (AI4), radioprotective agent No. 2 - 10 tablets of potassium iodide 0.25 each in a white pencil case. Radioprotective agent No. 2 is intended for persons in the zone of radioactive fallout: it blocks the thyroid gland for radioactive iodine, which comes from the breath, food and water. Take 1 tablet on an empty stomach for 10 days (in peacetime, in the event of an accident at a nuclear power plant, take all the time and another 8 days after the last discharge). Radioactive iodine, with a half-life of 8 days, entering the human body during atomic explosions and accidents replaces normal iodine in the body, which usually accumulates in the thyroid gland as necessary for its functioning, which as a result can lead to thyroid cancer. Diffuse toxic goiter and thyroiditis - diseases of the immune system - can be the harbingers of cancer. Typical signs of diffuse toxic goiter: irritability, weakness, palpitations, lack of concentration, tearfulness, decreased performance, pain in the eyes, enlargement and bulging of the eyes, fussiness. It is known that an effective counteraction is potassium iodide, which saturates the thyroid gland with iodine and prevents the entry of the radionuclide into it. 
%c[0,140,140,140]Way of use:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] taken orally
 
%c[0,140,140,140]Effects:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] significant reduction of the radiation dose (~500 mZv çà 2 èñïîëüçîâàíèÿ)

Epinephrine (also known as adrenaline) is a hormone together with a neurotransmitter. Adrenaline has many functions in the body: it instantly regulates the heart rate, dilates blood vessels making it easier for air to pass through them, and induces metabolic shifts. Adrenaline is released when fighting or fleeing from the sympathetic nervous system. The effects lead to an increase in blood glucose and fatty acids, thereby providing the body with instant substrates for energy production within cells throughout the body.

It is advisable to use this drug preventively, before irradiation, since it does not have an immediate effect. It has a long-lasting effect.

An experimental drug developed for research teams operating in the Zone. Formulated with the tetradotoxin known as "zombie powder", it causes complete paralysis of the central nervous system; presumably this could provide survival out of cover during the blowout. Tushonka is a generic term for canned stew produced in the Soviet Union and other Warsaw Pact countries. The irony is that the idea for such a product came to Russia during World War II in the form of aid from the United States. Since then, various types of stew have become the main means of long-term storage of meat, which is used by both the civilian population and the ranks of the army. It should be noted that, despite the long shelf life, the stew has a high nutritional value (due to its high fat content) and a relatively good taste. The Chernobyl Exclusion Zone has seen many varieties of stew. Since the spring of 2013, minced meat of the Abakan brand remains the undoubted leader among other canned food.

A bottle of red wine. Natural red wine increases the body's resistance to viral, electromagnetic and radiation effects, contains a natural antioxidant that protects against radiation effects, and due to the presence of resveratrol, it is able to prevent some of the damage caused by it, due to the presence of rubidium in it, accelerates the removal of radioactive cesium from the body. In the 70-80s of the last century, natural red wines were introduced into the diet of the crews of nuclear submarines and personnel serving radioactive installations. The Chernobyl tragedy forced hypocrisy and propaganda to retreat in the struggle for a "sober lifestyle." Literally the next day after the accident, huge stocks of red dry wine were delivered to Kiev.

This is a pretty good and relatively healthy way to stay on your feet when you get tired or when you wait out the cold, dark nights.

Military flasks are designed for drinking water in small sips. Produced and cleaned with special products. First, water, combined with a special type of alcohol, is boiled at a very high temperature for cleaning and disinfection purposes. Secondly, the water is cooled in refrigerators. Ultimately, we get completely purified water from radiation contamination. If you still doubt its purity, you can additionally throw in a couple of tablets of "Aquatabs". Due to the complicated manufacturing and cleaning process, military water flasks appear in limited quantities and are sold to stalkers at a reasonable price. Doctors also have them in stock, but they are a little more expensive, since there is a surcharge for the cost of deliveries.

«Raven's beak» is a strong mixture of vodka produced within the Zone and crushed black raven beaks. But not every beak is suitable as an ingredient, but only the beak of males that have been in the Zone for more than 15 years. their beak is more susceptible to mutation. It is rumored that such beaks are very rich in protein, which, together with vodka, removes radiation from the body. Some say that drinking such a mixture gives the sensation of growing wings for a few seconds. The taste, however, is nowhere worse.

A heavy slab of chimera meat. Chimera is one of the most dangerous creatures, that is why its meat is highly valued by veteran stalkers, who are willing to pay quite a hefty price for it. Cooks on Skadovsk use this meat as one of key ingredients of so-called "Hunter's meal". But only few people will admit that chimera meat tastes almost identical to boar chops. Might be of interest to scientists. Besides, it gives access to animal fat of the highest quality available in the Zone, which can be used for easy and efficient weapon lubrication.
